name: Super Bomberman 2
overview: A galactic threat of explosive proportions! Aliens set on universal domination, have sent a team of evil cyborgs to confront the mighty Bomberman! Our hero fights valiantly to no avail as the cyborgs, known as the Five Bad Bombers, succeed in capturing him. With Bomberman trapped in an underground prison, the aliens are free to carry out their evil plans with little opposition. But wait! Bomberman escapes and a shimmer of hope shines for the universe! Bomberman must face hordes of enemies and countless traps scattered throughout the huge alien base. Will Bomberman blast away the Five Bad Bombers or be blown away himself? The future of the world is in his hands - and bombs!
